analysis_qa_and_automation.assumption: Feature extraction settings align with domain (speech vs music etc.).
analysis_qa_and_automation.avoid: Avoid treating single metrics as absolute quality verdicts.

creative_spectral_effects.assumption: Spectral manipulations are desired even with timbral coloration.
creative_spectral_effects.failure: Can introduce intentional but strong coloration or temporal artifacts.

denoise_and_restoration.assumption: Noise/artifacts are distinguishable from desired signal statistics.
denoise_and_restoration.avoid: Avoid high reduction settings on sparse acoustic sources without auditioning.
denoise_and_restoration.failure: Over-reduction can remove detail and create modulation artifacts.

dereverb_and_room_correction.assumption: Late reverberation is separable from direct content under chosen model.
dereverb_and_room_correction.avoid: Avoid strong dereverb when room character is part of artistic intent.
dereverb_and_room_correction.failure: Speech/music clarity can drop if early reflections are over-suppressed.

dynamics_and_loudness.assumption: Program dynamics fit compressor/limiter time constants and thresholds.
dynamics_and_loudness.avoid: Avoid applying multiple strong dynamics stages without gain staging checks.
dynamics_and_loudness.failure: Pumping, breathing, or overs if thresholds and release are mis-set.

granular_and_modulation.assumption: Grain and modulation rates are musically matched to source texture.
granular_and_modulation.avoid: Avoid dense granular settings on speech intelligibility-critical content.
granular_and_modulation.failure: Incoherent grain scheduling can produce choppiness or blur.

pitch_detection_and_tracking.assumption: F0 evidence is strong in the selected analysis band and frame size.
pitch_detection_and_tracking.avoid: Avoid as the sole control signal for dense polyphonic mixtures.
pitch_detection_and_tracking.failure: Octave errors and voicing flips under heavy noise/polyphony.

retune_and_intonation.assumption: Detected notes map cleanly to intended tonal center/scale.
retune_and_intonation.avoid: Avoid aggressive correction when preserving natural micro-intonation is required.
retune_and_intonation.failure: Over-correction can flatten expressive vibrato or slides.

separation_and_decomposition.assumption: Sources have partially separable spectral or statistical structure.
separation_and_decomposition.avoid: Avoid expecting perfect stems from strongly correlated or co-modulated sources.
separation_and_decomposition.failure: Component bleeding and musical noise under overlap or model mismatch.

spatial_and_multichannel.assumption: Channel geometry/order and timing metadata are correct.
spatial_and_multichannel.avoid: Avoid blind spatial processing when channel order/calibration is unknown.
spatial_and_multichannel.failure: Spatial collapse, combing, or localization bias from misalignment.

spectral_time_frequency_transforms.assumption: Transform parameterization matches target time-frequency structure.
spectral_time_frequency_transforms.avoid: Avoid default settings for highly nonstationary signals without tuning.
spectral_time_frequency_transforms.failure: Incorrect parameterization can smear events or over-fragment spectra.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumption: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.avoid: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.

denoise_and_restoration.assumptions: Noise/artifacts are distinguishable from desired signal statistics. Noise model should be representative of observed noise floor.
denoise_and_restoration.failure_modes: Over-reduction can remove detail and create modulation artifacts. Mismatched noise estimate leaves residue or damages detail.
denoise_and_restoration.name: Declick/decrackle (median/wavelet + interpolation)
denoise_and_restoration.when_not_to_use: Avoid high reduction settings on sparse acoustic sources without auditioning. Avoid static settings on rapidly varying nonstationary noise.

denoise_and_restoration.assumptions: Noise/artifacts are distinguishable from desired signal statistics. Noise model should be representative of observed noise floor.
denoise_and_restoration.failure_modes: Over-reduction can remove detail and create modulation artifacts. Mismatched noise estimate leaves residue or damages detail.
denoise_and_restoration.name: Declip via sparse reconstruction
denoise_and_restoration.when_not_to_use: Avoid high reduction settings on sparse acoustic sources without auditioning. Avoid static settings on rapidly varying nonstationary noise.

dereverb_and_room_correction.assumptions: Late reverberation is separable from direct content under chosen model. Reverberation tail is assumed more diffuse than direct content.
dereverb_and_room_correction.failure_modes: Speech/music clarity can drop if early reflections are over-suppressed. Over-suppression can thin tonal body and ambience.
dereverb_and_room_correction.name: Blind deconvolution dereverb
dereverb_and_room_correction.when_not_to_use: Avoid strong dereverb when room character is part of artistic intent. Avoid for intentionally wet effects unless mix preservation is planned.

dereverb_and_room_correction.assumptions: Late reverberation is separable from direct content under chosen model. Reverberation tail is assumed more diffuse than direct content.
dereverb_and_room_correction.failure_modes: Speech/music clarity can drop if early reflections are over-suppressed. Over-suppression can thin tonal body and ambience.

dereverb_and_room_correction.when_not_to_use: Avoid strong dereverb when room character is part of artistic intent. Avoid fully unattended use on out-of-domain material. Avoid for intentionally wet effects unless mix preservation is planned.

pitch_detection_and_tracking.assumptions: F0 evidence is strong in the selected analysis band and frame size. Model priors assume training-like signal statistics.

retune_and_intonation.assumptions: Detected notes map cleanly to intended tonal center/scale. Pitch trajectory estimates should be continuous enough for retuning.
retune_and_intonation.failure_modes: Over-correction can flatten expressive vibrato or slides. Fast F0 jumps can cause audible stepping.
retune_and_intonation.name: Adaptive intonation (context-sensitive intervals)
retune_and_intonation.when_not_to_use: Avoid aggressive correction when preserving natural micro-intonation is required. Avoid high-strength retune on breath/noise segments.

separation_and_decomposition.assumptions: Sources have partially separable spectral or statistical structure.
separation_and_decomposition.failure_modes: Component bleeding and musical noise under overlap or model mismatch.

spatial_and_multichannel.assumptions: Channel geometry/order and timing metadata are correct.
spatial_and_multichannel.failure_modes: Spatial collapse, combing, or localization bias from misalignment.
spatial_and_multichannel.name: Ambisonic binaural rendering
spatial_and_multichannel.when_not_to_use: Avoid blind spatial processing when channel order/calibration is unknown.

spatial_and_multichannel.failure_modes: Spatial collapse, combing, or localization bias from misalignment.

spatial_and_multichannel.assumptions: Channel geometry/order and timing metadata are correct. Reverberation tail is assumed more diffuse than direct content.
spatial_and_multichannel.failure_modes: Spatial collapse, combing, or localization bias from misalignment. Over-suppression can thin tonal body and ambience.
spatial_and_multichannel.name: Coherence-based dereverb (multichannel)
spatial_and_multichannel.when_not_to_use: Avoid blind spatial processing when channel order/calibration is unknown. Avoid for intentionally wet effects unless mix preservation is planned.

spatial_and_multichannel.failure_modes: Spatial collapse, combing, or localization bias from misalignment. Steering mismatch causes target suppression or sidelobe leakage.

spectral_time_frequency_transforms.assumptions: Transform parameterization matches target time-frequency structure.
spectral_time_frequency_transforms.failure_modes: Incorrect parameterization can smear events or over-fragment spectra.
spectral_time_frequency_transforms.name: Chirplet transform analysis
spectral_time_frequency_transforms.when_not_to_use: Avoid default settings for highly nonstationary signals without tuning.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: Beat-synchronous time warping
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: Harmonic/percussive split TSM
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: LP-PSOLA
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth. Phase continuity assumptions hold best for moderate stretch ratios.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients. Extreme settings increase phasiness/transient blur risk.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: Multi-resolution phase vocoder
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical. Avoid very large stretch+pitch shifts without transient controls.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: Nonlinear time maps (curves, anchors, spline timing)
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: TD-PSOLA
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.

time_scale_and_pitch_core.assumptions: Frames are locally quasi-stationary and harmonic evolution is reasonably smooth.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.failure_modes: High-ratio stretch can introduce phasiness and blurred transients.
time_scale_and_pitch_core.name: WSOLA (Waveform Similarity Overlap-Add)
time_scale_and_pitch_core.when_not_to_use: Avoid for extreme percussive-only material when attack realism is critical.
